item.title: Upgrading to a larger SSD on Ubuntu
item.description: Today I upgraded the base 256 GB SSD (2.5 mm) on my Thinkpad T460 to a 1 TB Samsung 860 EVO. It took me a few google searches to learn how to make the transition. In the end, I used Tuxboot to make a bootable Clonezilla USB drive, and then GParted to resize my partition. Hereâ€™s what I did step-by-step: Connect your new SSD via USB. I used a StarTech cable from Amazon.
